summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6664 for the improvement of S. Concord St. from W. Marginal Way S. to 10th Ave. S.; and certain other avenues, streets, and alley and an easement; by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 105033, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
